listener -
Returns:

getMerchants

DataLoader getMerchants(java.lang.String postCode,
                        double latitude,
                        double longitude,
                        java.lang.String city,
                        java.lang.String searchTerm,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> merchantTypeIds,
                        DataLoadListener listener)
Load all merchants based on advance search criteria like type, location, term

Parameters:
postCode - Area to look. Optional
latitude - double with the location of merchants to retrieve. Optional.
longitude - double with the location of merchants to retrieve. Optional.
city - City to look. Optional
searchTerm - String with a search term to use in merchant filtering. Optional.
merchantTypeIds -
listener -
Returns:
DataLoader object performing a network operation. When returned, it allows the external developer to cancel it in case the app does not need the data anymore

                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> merchantTypeIds,
                        DataLoadListener listener,

Parameters:
postCode - Area to look. Optional
latitude - double with the location of merchants to retrieve. Optional.
longitude - double with the location of merchants to retrieve. Optional.
city - City to look. Optional
searchTerm - String with a search term to use in merchant filtering. Optional.
merchantTypeIds -
limit - limit to fetch number of merchant. Optional.
listener -
Returns:
DataLoader object performing a network operation. When returned, it allows the external developer to cancel it in case the app does not need the data anymore

                                    java.lang.String externalId,
                                    DataLoadListener listener)
Parameters:
limit - Amount of merchants to retrieve
externalId - id read from a QR code or any other external source. Optional
Returns:

getMerchants

DataLoader getMerchants(java.lang.String postCode,
                        double latitude,
                        double longitude,
                        java.lang.String city,
                        java.lang.String searchTerm,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> merchantTypeIds,
                        DataLoadListener listener,
                        java.lang.Integer limit,
                        java.lang.String externalId)
Load all merchants based on advance search criteria like type, location, term,É If limit and offset included, then paginated results are expected. Note that a page could contain less than limit locations in case the user can not see some private ones

Parameters:
postCode - Area to look. Optional
latitude - double with the location of merchants to retrieve. Optional.
longitude - double with the location of merchants to retrieve. Optional.
city - City to look. Optional
searchTerm - String with a search term to use in merchant filtering
merchantTypeIds -
limit - Amount of merchants to retrieve
externalId - externalId for merchant
listener -
Returns:
DataLoader object performing a network operation. When returned, it allows the external developer to cancel it in case the app does not need the data anymore

getMerchants

DataLoader getMerchants(java.lang.String postCode,
                        double latitude,
                        double longitude,
                        java.lang.String city,
                        java.lang.String searchTerm,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> merchantTypeIds,
                        DataLoadListener listener,
                        java.lang.Integer limit,
                        java.lang.String externalId,
                        java.lang.Integer offset)
Parameters:
postCode - Area to look. Optional
latitude - double with the location of merchants to retrieve
longitude - double with the location of merchants to retrieve
city - City to look. Optional
searchTerm - String with a search term to use in merchant filtering
merchantTypeIds -
limit - limit to fetch number of merchant. Optional.
externalId - externalId for merchant. Optional.
offset - Position of first merchant to be returned in paginated results. Optional.
listener -
Returns:
DataLoader object performing a network operation. When returned, it allows the external developer to cancel it in case the app does not need the data anymore

getMerchantDetail

DataLoader getMerchantDetail(java.lang.String merchantId,
                             java.lang.Boolean includeCategories,
                             java.lang.Boolean includeProducts,
                             DataLoadListener listener)
Load a merchant detail and optionally includes the categories and products in its menu

Parameters:
merchantId - id of the Merchant to perform action with.
includeCategories - Boolean indicating whether the categories should also be included
includeProducts - Boolean indicating whether the products should also be included. Products require categories as well
listener -
Returns:
DataLoader object performing a network operation. When returned, it allows the external developer to cancel it in case the app does not need the data anymore

                                 DataLoadListener listener)

Parameters:
merchantId - MerchantId to load
listener -

DataLoader object performing a network operation. When returned, it allows the external developer to cancel it in case the app does not need the data anymore

getClusterMerchant

DataLoader getClusterMerchant(java.lang.String topRightLatLong,
                              java.lang.String bottomLeftLatLong,
                              java.lang.Integer maxResult,
                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> merchantTypeIds,
                              DataLoadListener listener)
Load all merchants in clusters based on location

Parameters:
topRightLatLong - String with top right latitude and longitude in format "lat,long"
bottomLeftLatLong - String with bottom left latitude and longitude in format "lat,long"
maxResult - maximum amount of merchants that can be shown in the map (rest will be clustered)
merchantTypeIds - list of merchantType ids. Optional.
listener -
Returns:
DataLoader object performing a network operation. When returned, it allows the external developer to cancel it in case the app does not need the data anymore
